actionCalls.name: myRule_17_A2
actionCalls.label: Notify TPM Quote request Quote Complete

rules.name: myRule_11
rules.label: FS(CAN) TPM Quote Req - Add Opp Team Mem

rules.name: myRule_15
rules.label: TS TPM Quote Req - Add TS Team Mem

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Request TPM Quote From is Blank

value.stringValue: or( and( [Opportunity].TPM_Quote_Completed__c =False, priorvalue([Opportunity].TPM_Quote_Completed__c) = True ), and( [Opportunity].Account.ShippingCountry = 'CA', [Opportunity].TPM_Quote_Request_To_Business__c = 'Field Services', [Opportunity].TPM_Quote_Completed__c =False, priorvalue([Opportunity].TPM_Quote_Completed__c) = True ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: or( and( {!myVariable_current.TPM_Quote_Completed__c} =False, priorvalue({!myVariable_current.TPM_Quote_Completed__c}) = True ), and( {!myVariable_current.Account.ShippingCountry} = 'CA', {!myVariable_current.TPM_Quote_Request_To_Business__c} = 'Field Services', {!myVariable_current.TPM_Quote_Completed__c} =False, priorvalue({!myVariable_current.TPM_Quote_Completed__c}) = True ) )
